entry.title: 3M 1170-1177S-30X50 - 3M ElectroCut Film, 1177CS, green, pre-punched, 30 in x 50 yd 1170-1177S-30X50 7000129318
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 1035.81

[shortdesc]

3M ElectroCut Film, 1177CS, green, pre-punched, 30 in x 50 yd

  • 3M ElectroCut Film is a transparent acrylic film often used in place of silk screened inks to provide background copy and logos for retroreflective signs
  • Series 1170 films are compatible with a variety of 3M Reflective Sheeting used in permanent signage
  • Coated with a transparent, pressure-sensitive adhesive, this film includes a special liner designed to help make kiss-cutting easier when working with cutting machines
  • This film offers equal or improved retroreflective performance over sheeting screened with transparent inks and is available pre-punched for sprocket-fed cutters.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Designed for use with 3M Reflective Sheeting used in permanent signage
  • Acrylic film provides coloured, transparent background copy and logos for retroreflective signs
  • Offers equal or improved retroreflective performance over silk screened, transparent inks
  • Pressure-sensitive adhesive backing with liner
  • Pre-punched
  • Colour: Green
    		•

entry.title: 3M 1805-GAL - 3M Screen Printing Ink 1805 black 1 gallon (3.8 L) per container 1805-GAL 7000129324
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 401.23

[shortdesc]

3M Screen Printing Ink, 1805, black, 1 gallon (3.8 L) per container

  • 3M™ Screen Printing Ink is a fast-drying process colour ink used for screen printing
  • Intended exclusively for use with 3M™ Diamond Grade™ Roll-Up Sign Sheeting Series RS60/64, this black, opaque process colour can be conveniently conveyer or air dried
  • Because this process colour dries quickly, please note that this colour also evaporates quickly and in greater amounts than other process colours
  • When air drying sheeting printed with this ink in large volumes, please allow for sufficient ventilation due to vapours.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Color Black
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Opaque ink colour used for screen processing copy or background colours on 3M™ Diamond Grade™ Roll-Up Sign Sheeting Series RS60/64
  • Weather-resistant, remains colour-fast and adheres well to compatible sheeting series
  • Compatible with 3M™ Diamond Grade™ Roll-Up Sign Sheeting Series RS60/64
  • Colour: Black (opaque)
  • Dries and evaporates quickly
  • Maintain ventilation when air drying
